column3: Verified move-only other than the necessary header changes and the MAX_BLOCK_SIZE change I nagged about.\n
I moved MAX_BLOCK_SIZE to core/block.h, though in a separate commit, merger can chose to include that or not based on random coin flip (as long as its fair based on bitcoin block hashes).\n

Oh this moves things out of main.cpp/h. That's nice!
ACK verified move-only
commithash afd4b94b6dabab29dee5a12966ce217700381682
([signature](https://dev.visucore.com/bitcoin/acks/5181))
Can we move out of main instead of duplicating it? Other files need this too and could drop their dependency on main.h (bitcoin-tx.cpp for ex).\n
Oops, that was a test, didnt mean to leave that duplication in there...anyway, yea, it should be moved out.\n
Can you keep the header include and ordering policy please.\n
